website_summaries.verdict: Small unit meant for 1/4 acre or less. Has some trouble staying within boundaries, but gets the job done.
pros: Manual and online help are adequate to get and keep it running
Quiet running that's good for weekends and early mornings
cons: Requires a factory PIN before you can run it
Not much customer support, and most dealers don't know how to help

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to buy install kit with mower
customer_reviews.text: When ordering the mower, I opted for the professional install but it never advised that I would need to buy the install kit separately. I had to reschedule install after they showed up and informed that it needed an install kit that is purchased separtely. Have not tried mower yet so only giving 2 stars for now.
customer_reviews.author: Leisha E. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. I live in Florida. Worth its weight in gold. Excellent product. Thank you husquana
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Installation is a nightmare
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job. The only issue is installation. It's a nightmare to install this thing. Takes days and not easy to figure out how to cover all parts of the lawn. Highly recommend that one uses professional service, not just any service, but someone experienced with it. Hard to find a dealer that has done it a few times
customer_reviews.author: Deepa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful time and lawn saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1/2 acre back yard.m which was getting torn up by my rider’s tires. My grass is filling in and staying cut!

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STARS
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars Perhaps the. Eat purchase I have ever made Unique product and cutting that I don't have to do. Looks great works great. SUPERB product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I have had my mower since last October. I am 82 yrs old and have a fairly large yard. It did take a while to lay the wire so that it would cut a narrow strip across the sidewalk and another area on the other side of the drive. I checked it out last fall to be sure it cut every area and got through a narrow passage on the side yard. It has cut my yard 4 days a week from 8am to 6pm and has done wonderful job. I would recommend this mower to anyone too.old or too hot for mowing. My neighbors are amazed at the job it does.
customer_reviews.author: A. Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: WHATEVER YOU DO, BUY FROM ANOTHER COMPANY!
customer_reviews.text: In less than one year of ownership, one of the wheels has fallen off twice, and the cutting disc underneath became completely detached from the blades. You spend $1000s on this thing, and it can't keep itself together through MINIMAL use. And Husqvarna appears to go out of their way to make sure you don't get to use a warranty claim, meaning your initial investment isn't even the last of your spending on this thing. Whatever you do, buy another company's product - it's likely less expensive, higher quality, and better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend getting the large install kit
customer_reviews.text: I'd recommend getting the large install kit. This thing makes keeping the yard clean very easy. Once it is set up, all the work is done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Rather disappointing. It mows about 80% of the lawn but guess it has to have a perfectly flat lawn. Ours is not flat. It often gets stuck on ruts and obstacles. Often mows the same space several times while ignoring other parts. Thus there are tufts of grass throughout the lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stack

product_meta.title: Husqvarna AUTOMOWER 315, Robotic Lawn Mower (Install Kit Sold Separately)
product_meta.description: Allow Husqvarna to introduce you to the set it and forget it lifestyle. Maintain your grass with the touch of a button with AUTOMOWER 315 and the Connect@Home app (Bluetooth connectivity works up to 100ft). 315 is your fully automated, robotic battery solution that cuts grass day or night, rain or shine. Anti-collision sensors keep your pets and children safe and an anti-theft alarm keeps your mower secure from theft (pin code required). At Husqvarna we've invested more than 20 years of research, design and innovation in robotic mowing technology. You can buy your 315 with confidence knowing you've partnered with the global leader in robotic mowing. Get your weekends back and a perfect lawn 24/7.

Rain or shine, Automower can continuously mow, allowing the very fine grass clippings to act as natural fertilizer for your grass - no more bagging or raking required
This mower tackles yards up to .4 acres, slopes up to 22 degrees and cuts grass up to 2.4 inches tall
Backed by a 2-year limited warranty for residential use

Smart home meets smart lawn - manage your lawn with the touch of a button and maintain a yard your neighbor's will envy; the Connect@Home app allows you to set and adjust your Automower's cutting schedule with ease (Bluetooth connectivity works up to 100 ft)
